name: 4 DAYS on Australia's LONGEST Train Journey: The INDIAN PACIFIC
description:
I spent 4 days onboard the Indian Pacific, Australia's longest train, crossing the entire country from Sydney to Perth.

OFFICIAL NOEL MERCH: https://www.noelphilips.com
